hero.title: Help & FAQ
hero.subtitle: Find answers to the most common questions about Click Win

q1.question: What is Click Win?
q1.answer: Click Win is a blockchain-powered auction platform where users buy digital clicks and compete in timed auctions to win prizes at deep discounts. Key features include:
list: Auctions on BNB Chain for transparency

q2.question: How do I get started?
q2.answer: Getting started with Click Win is easy. Follow these steps:
list: Install MetaMask or any EVM-compatible wallet
Connect your wallet on the Click Win homepage
Deposit BNB or USDT to your unique deposit address
Join a live auction and start clicking!

q3.question: What are digital clicks?
q3.answer: Digital clicks are non-refundable platform credits used to participate in auctions. Each click costs $0.20 and is consumed when you click during a live auction. Clicks are not cryptocurrency, not financial instruments, and have no value outside the Click Win platform.

q4.question: How do auctions work?
q4.answer: Each auction has a countdown timer and a prize. When you click, the timer resets and a small amount is added to the discount pool. The mechanics are:
list: Each click resets the timer (usually 30 seconds)
Each click increases the prize discount
When the timer reaches zero, the last clicker wins
The winner pays the discounted price for the prize
All results are recorded on BNB Chain

q5.question: Is Click Win a gambling platform?
q5.answer: No. Click Win is an entertainment and auction platform. Users purchase digital credits (clicks) to participate in a competitive auction mechanic. There is no house edge, no random number generation, and no betting. The outcome is determined entirely by user actions (clicking) and timing.

q6.question: How does the referral program work?
q6.answer: Every user gets a unique referral code linked to their wallet address. When someone signs up through your link and makes their first click purchase, you receive a bonus. Details:
list: 20% bonus of the referred user's first click purchase
Track your referrals in the Partner dashboard

q7.question: What blockchain does Click Win use?
q7.answer: Click Win runs on BNB Chain (formerly Binance Smart Chain), Chain ID 56. We chose BNB Chain for its low transaction fees, fast block times, and wide wallet support. All deposits, auction settlements, and prize distributions are handled on-chain.

s1.title: Introduction
s1.p1: By accessing and using the Click Win platform, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Use. Click Win is an entertainment and auction platform powered by blockchain technology on BNB Chain. If you do not agree with these terms, please do not use the platform.

s2.title: Nature of the Platform
s2.intro: Click Win is a digital auction entertainment platform. Users should understand that:
s2.l1: Click Win is NOT a gambling, betting, or financial investment platform.
s2.l2: Digital clicks are platform credits used for entertainment purposes only.
s2.l3: Auction outcomes are determined by user actions (timing and clicking), not by random number generation.
s2.l4: The platform does not provide financial advice or investment recommendations.
s2.l5: Participation is voluntary and for entertainment purposes.
s2.p1: Users acknowledge that participating in auctions involves spending platform credits with no guarantee of winning.

s3.title: Eligibility
s3.intro: To use Click Win, you must:
s3.l1: Be at least 18 years old or the legal age in your jurisdiction.
s3.l2: Have a compatible EVM wallet (MetaMask or similar).
s3.l3: Not be a resident of any jurisdiction where participation is prohibited by local law.
s3.p1: By using Click Win, you represent that you meet all eligibility requirements.

s4.title: Wallet-Based Access
s4.l1: Your EVM wallet address serves as your unique identity on the platform.
s4.l2: You are solely responsible for the security of your wallet, private keys, and seed phrase.
s4.p1: Click Win will never ask for your private keys or seed phrase. We are not responsible for any loss resulting from compromised wallet credentials.

s5.title: Digital Credits (Clicks)
s5.intro: Digital clicks are non-refundable platform credits:
s5.l1: Clicks are purchased using BNB or USDT at a fixed rate of $0.20 per click.
s5.l2: Clicks are NOT cryptocurrency, tokens, or financial instruments.
s5.l3: Clicks have no monetary value outside the Click Win platform.
s5.l4: Clicks cannot be transferred, exchanged, or redeemed for cash.
s5.l5: All click purchases are final and non-refundable.
s5.p1: The platform reserves the right to modify click pricing with prior notice.

s6.title: Auction Mechanism
s6.intro: Auctions operate under the following rules:
s6.l1: Each auction has a fixed prize and a countdown timer.
s6.l2: Each click resets the timer and consumes one credit.
s6.l3: The last user to click when the timer expires wins the prize.
s6.p1: The platform uses atomic Redis operations and server-side validation to ensure fair play. Any attempt to manipulate the auction mechanism may result in account suspension.

s7.title: Prize Settlement
s7.p1: Prizes are settled on-chain via BNB Chain smart contracts. The winner receives their prize after the auction is finalized and validated by the system.
s7.p2: Settlement times may vary depending on blockchain network conditions. The platform is not responsible for delays caused by network congestion.

s8.title: Volatility Disclaimer
s8.p1: Cryptocurrency values are inherently volatile. The value of deposits, prizes, and platform credits may fluctuate based on market conditions. Click Win is not responsible for any losses resulting from cryptocurrency price changes.

s9.title: Platform Rights
s9.intro: Click Win reserves the right to:
s9.l1: Modify, suspend, or discontinue any aspect of the platform at any time.
s9.l2: Update these Terms of Use with reasonable notice.
s9.l3: Suspend or terminate accounts that violate these terms or engage in suspicious activity.
s9.l4: Adjust auction parameters, click pricing, and reward structures.
s9.l5: Implement KYC/AML procedures if required by applicable regulations.

s10.title: Limitation of Liability
s10.p1: Click Win, its operators, developers, and affiliates shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from your use of the platform. This includes but is not limited to: loss of funds, wallet compromise, smart contract failures, network congestion, or regulatory actions.

s11.title: Governing Law
s11.p1: These Terms of Use are governed by applicable international law and the laws of the jurisdiction where Click Win is registered. Any disputes shall be resolved through binding arbitration.

s1.title: Data We Collect
s1.intro: Click Win collects minimal data necessary to operate the platform:
s1.l1: Wallet address (public EVM address used for authentication and transactions)
s1.l2: Transaction history (deposits, click purchases, auction participation, winnings)
s1.l3: Referral data (referral codes and linked wallet addresses)
s1.l5: IP address (for security and rate-limiting purposes only)
s1.p1: We do NOT collect email addresses, names, phone numbers, or any personally identifiable information. Your wallet address is your identity.

s2.title: Purpose of Data Collection
s2.intro: We use collected data exclusively for:
s2.l4: Platform security, fraud prevention, and anti-abuse measures
s2.l5: Improving platform performance and user experience

s3.title: Blockchain Transparency
s3.p1: All transactions on Click Win are recorded on BNB Chain (a public blockchain). This means that wallet addresses, deposit amounts, auction results, and prize settlements are publicly visible on the blockchain. This is inherent to blockchain technology and provides full auditability.

s4.title: Cookies & Local Storage
s4.p1: Click Win uses local storage to save your language preference and wallet connection state. We do not use tracking cookies or third-party analytics. No advertising trackers are present on the platform.

s5.title: Data Retention
s5.p1: Transaction records are retained indefinitely as they are part of the blockchain public record. Platform-side data (session info, rate-limiting data) is retained only as long as necessary for platform operation and security.

risk.title: Risk Disclosure
risk.intro: Please read this risk disclosure carefully before using Click Win. Participating in blockchain-based platforms involves inherent risks.

r1.title: Wallet & Security Risks
r1.desc: You are solely responsible for the security of your wallet, private keys, and seed phrase. If your wallet is compromised, funds may be irretrievably lost. Click Win cannot recover lost or stolen assets.

r2.title: Smart Contract Risks
r2.desc: While our smart contracts are designed and tested for security, no software is immune to bugs or vulnerabilities. Smart contract failures could result in loss of funds.

r3.title: Blockchain Network Risks
r3.desc: BNB Chain network congestion, outages, or forks could delay transactions, affect auction timing, or impact prize settlement. The platform is not liable for blockchain-level issues.

r4.title: Cryptocurrency Volatility
r4.desc: The value of BNB, USDT, and other cryptocurrencies can fluctuate significantly. The value of your deposits and prizes may change due to market conditions.

r5.title: Regulatory Changes
r5.desc: Cryptocurrency and blockchain regulations vary by jurisdiction and are evolving rapidly. Changes in law may affect your ability to use the platform or the legality of participation in your region.

risk.disclaimer: By using Click Win, you acknowledge these risks and accept full responsibility for your participation.

credits.title: Credits Policy
credits.intro: This policy explains the nature, use, and limitations of digital credits (clicks) on the Click Win platform.

c1.title: Platform Access Credits
c1.desc: Digital clicks are credits that grant access to platform features, specifically auction participation. They are the mechanism through which users interact with the auction system.

c2.title: Not Currency
c2.desc: Clicks are NOT cryptocurrency, digital currency, or any form of money. They have no monetary value outside of the Click Win platform and cannot be converted back to cryptocurrency or fiat.

c3.title: Not Financial Instruments
c3.desc: Clicks do not represent equity, debt, investment contracts, or any financial instrument. Purchasing clicks is not an investment and does not entitle the holder to any financial return.

c4.title: Non-Refundable
c4.desc: All click purchases are final. Clicks cannot be refunded, reversed, or exchanged. Users should only purchase clicks they intend to use on the platform.

c5.title: Expiration Policy
c5.desc: Clicks do not expire unless explicitly stated in a promotional campaign. The platform reserves the right to introduce expiration policies with advance notice.

credits.finalNote: Clicks are entertainment credits, not financial products. Use responsibly.

compliance.title: AML & Compliance
compliance.intro: Click Win is committed to maintaining a safe and compliant platform. This page outlines our approach to anti-money laundering (AML) and regulatory compliance.

doNot.title: What We Do NOT Support
doNot.l1: Click Win does not support fiat currency transactions. All deposits are in cryptocurrency (BNB or USDT) only.
doNot.l2: Click Win does not offer custodial wallet services. Users maintain full control of their wallets at all times.
doNot.l3: Click Win does not facilitate peer-to-peer transfers of clicks or platform credits between users.

rights.title: The Platform Reserves the Right To
rights.l1: Implement KYC (Know Your Customer) verification if required by applicable law or regulation.
rights.l2: Suspend or terminate accounts that exhibit suspicious activity, potential fraud, or money laundering indicators.
rights.l3: Cooperate with law enforcement and regulatory authorities when legally required to do so.

footer.disclaimer: Click Win is an entertainment platform. Digital clicks are not financial instruments.
